content:
/>
XI.ii.3.E.12.f
.
Burial Payment Made to Accrued or Substitute Claimant
If VA paid burial benefits to the accrued or substitute claimant, subtract the amount of burial benefits paid from the claimed burial expenses.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
